DarkMouse::

She went rummaging around the brig area.  She found the rusting 
remains of two bots that were chained to the wall inside the second 
cell.  She walked in and smiled. "Ah yes. Well, they aren't much to 
look at, but they will do. Surely there is enough parts undernieth 
the rust to be of some use."  She opened a small compartment in her 
forearm and pulled out a small electron Multi-tool. She started to 
work disasembling the bot. 
In a half an hour, she had the first bot disected and neatly piled up 
against the wall.  She looked at the parts one by one to make sure 
they were good enough to use.  She found a small chip in the chest 
cavity of the bot.  She pulled it out and looked at it. "Hmmm, what 
have we here? Ah, it's the maximal signature chip. How nice. This 
could come in real..."
Her fingers slipped and the chip fell down her front armor and into 
her front plating. She frowned. "Now how stupid can a bot get? Butter 
Fingers DarkMouse." she said under her breath.  She reached around 
and tried to get the chip out, but couldn't reach it.  The chip moved 
around as she moved. The chip came to rest under some wires in her 
upper torso. She frowned but realized that the chip wouldn't do any 
harm unless it was activated. And she couldn't properly activate it 
with it just stuck inside. SO for now, she was safe.  She decided to 
worry about the small and insignificant chip for now and went back to 
work. She started disecting the second bot.
